steps.content: â€œGang gangâ€ is believed to come from the Chicago rap scene. Since â€œgang gangâ€ stems from African American Vernacular English (AAVE), itâ€™s important to consider when and how you use it. To use Black slang respectfully, make sure youâ€™re not using it in a performative way to â€œlevel upâ€ or earn credibility.
